[code] - Stable Economy & Active Market - God Wars - Fight Caves - Fully working Spirit Beast - Barrows (With easy acsess) - Active, Friendly Community Forum (25,000+ Active Users) - PK Points With Rewards - Custom items (such as the Lime whip, Lava whip, Death cape, Dragon kiteshield, Slayer helmet and pvp armors!) - Working Spirit shields (new bonuses & the actual shield bonuses) - New ::train command for those just starting out (with a wide variety of NPCs which new players can train on) [/code
